helpText: á_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________Ó.

generic.title: á_Error updating categories__________________________Ó
generic.message: á_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________Ó.

maxDepthExceeded.title: á_Error updating categories__________________________Ó
maxDepthExceeded.message: á_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________Ó.

destinationHasSameName.title: á_Error updating categories__________________________Ó
destinationHasSameName.message: á_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________Ó.

noSchema.title: á_Schema not found_________________Ó
noSchema.message: á_Item schema not found for user_________________Ó.

maxCharacter.title: á_Error updating categories__________________________Ó
maxCharacter.message: á_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________Ó.

deleteInUseCategory.title: á_Delete category________________Ó
deleteInUseCategory.message: á_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________Ó.

custom.title: á_Custom categories__________________Ó
custom.message: á_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________Ó.

arcgis.title: á_ArcGIS categories__________________Ó
arcgis.message: á_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________Ó.

iso.title: á_ISO categories_______________Ó
iso.message: á_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________Ó.

inspire.title: á_INSPIRE categories___________________Ó
inspire.message: á_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________Ó.
